skins.shipDescription: Colorado class battleship¡ª Maryland, hull number BB-46
skins.selfIntroduction: Eagle Union Colorado class battleship, ship no. 2 ¡°Maryland¡±. As one of the BIG SEVEN, I often attended various celebrations. I escaped the attack on Pearl Harbor from behind Oklahoma. After undergoing retrofit, I successfully completed counter strike attacks on the Sakura Empire Navy. I participated in Operation Magic Carpet and received a total of seven battle stars. Commander, I just saw gunfire over there...oh, nevermind it was the sunset.
skins.acquisition: I am Maryland, a member of the BIG SEVEN. ¡°Fighting Mary¡±, yes, that's what they call me! I heard there are many battles ahead. I look forward to them all!
skins.login: I think I smell gunpowder, has the battle started already? Pfft... turns out it was only Vestal cooking.
skins.details: Celebration? Honor? Nothing else except for battles will draw my attention.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Fighting beside my sisters is the happiest thing in the world!
skins.secretaryIdle2: I hate foul play, only fair duels are real battles!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Working? ...I don¡¯t know much about that, I¡¯ll just do whatever you tell me to do.
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, are we going into battle?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, our fighting power is not in that area of expertise.
